comments.author: Julian
comments.body: There is little accomplishment to passing a mountain biker on ones road bike whether or not they are spouting some lame excuse for their lack of performance. At least riding a mountain bike on Flag one can savor the joy of burying those road cyclists that you catch on the climb. Yeah I know its all about the ego....never lonely on my rides!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Julian, I was actually taking issue with him **assuming that I thought I was hot-stuff for passing him**, which I didn't. I could care less. I always assume that everyone around me is on an "easy" day; keeps the ego out of it. Because ultimately, you never know...and we're all gonna get old and die. On that note, I didn't get out today! Rats!!!
